items.q: Which highly influential designer spearheaded the creation of 'Super Mario Bros.', 'The Legend of Zelda', and 'Donkey Kong'?
items.explanation: He is widely considered one of the most important figures in gaming history.

items.q: The highest possible score in a standard game of Pac-Man is 3,333,360 points.
items.explanation: Achieving this score ends the game in a 'kill screen' due to an integer overflow.

items.q: In the board game 'Gloomhaven', players successfully win mainly by trading goods across Europe.
items.explanation: Gloomhaven is a cooperative campaign game about exploring dungeons and fighting monsters.

items.q: What massive cooperative board game became a massive critical success by physically hiding legacy components in sealed envelopes?
items.explanation: The game fundamentally changes permanently as players progress through a sprawling campaign.

items.q: What influential Japanese company created the Game Boy and the incredibly successful Nintendo DS?
items.explanation: The company originally started in 1889 producing handmade hanafuda playing cards.

items.q: Which terrifying 1999 video game tasks the protagonist Harry Mason with searching a heavily fogged town for his daughter?
items.explanation: The thick fog physically hid the limited render distance of the original PlayStation.

items.q: In the complex card game 'Bridge', what does 'dummy' mean?
items.a: The partner of the declarer, whose cards are placed face up on the table.
items.explanation: The declarer then plays both hands for the duration of the round.

items.q: What wildly popular 2011 sandbox game tasks players with creatively surviving terrifying creatures called Creepers?
items.explanation: The game was originally developed in Java.

items.q: Which critically acclaimed 2007 game is considered the spiritual successor to 'System Shock 2'?
items.explanation: Both games blend first-person shooting with complex RPG elements.

items.q: What massively multiplayer game involves heavily armored characters fighting in the 'Summoner's Rift'?
items.explanation: It is one of the most prominent esports titles.
